name: New Breed
tag_list: inbound-marketing, b2b-marketing, tech-marketing, b2b, sale, lead-generation, demand-generation
overview:
We are a marketing + sales company that builds high-growth businesses by transforming their marketing and sales process. Through a combination of marketing + sales strategies and platforms, we create and optimize the buyer’s lifecycle from an inbound lead to a customer.

We are a team of highly skilled inbound marketers, content creators, designers, developers and sales professionals who are focused on delivering solutions designed to meet the unique needs of your company and prospects. We work together to bring your organization a competitive advantage and drive measureable results.

Our biggest competitive advantage is our people, who are smart, driven, technology savvy, and empowered to do what it takes. Together we are creating the most technically advanced and innovative B2B marketing + sales company in the world.
